Frequently Asked Questions

Can I switch plans anytime?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

What happens if I exceed my message limit on the Hobby plan?

You'll be prompted to upgrade to Pro to continue using the service for that month.
